text: 264 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES 16.28 Undesignated frontages are areas within the District Centres that contribute to the overall offer of the centre but perform a more tertiary function (e.g. small offices, wholesalers and market storage) or community functions with little or no retail use. 16.29 Frontages have not been designated within the Canary Wharf Metropolitan Centre. This is because it is a predominantly undercover shopping complex in single, private ownership that functions differently to other town centres in the borough. 16.30 For the purposes of this policy, impacts on the amenity of neighbouring occupiers include odours, fumes and other air pollution, TOWN CENTRES
